aboutMeTextOne: Hello, I am an experienced frontend developer from Lübeck with a passion for modern web technologies. My focus is on creating user-friendly and appealing web interfaces with HTML, CSS and JavaScript, as well as frameworks such as Angular.
aboutMeTextTwo: I enjoy working closely with my clients to turn their ideas into reality. If you are planning a new project, I look forward to creating something great together!
headline: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
poloLocoOne: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach.
poloLocoTwo: Help Pepe to find coins and bottles to fight against the Killer Chicken
joinOne: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System.
joinTwo: Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
